verb.description: Treat (someone) in an indulgent or overprotective way.
examples: I found school very difficult, and realized I'd been mollycoddled at home
he was getting too old for such mollycoddling

noun.description: An effeminate or ineffectual man or boy.
examples: baseball is a game for red-blooded men and mollycoddles better stay out of it

origin: Mid 19th century: from molly girl or prostitute (see moll) + coddle.
